01.speaker: Ọbàtálá
01.text: Ọmọtẹmi, o ti ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Ọba Adéwálé. Kí ló ṣẹlẹ̀?
01.translation: Ọmọtẹmi, you have visited Ọba Adéwálé. What happened?
01.scene_description: The grove is quiet except for the rustling of leaves. Ọbàtálá stands before a glowing shrine, his presence calming yet powerful.

options.text: Ó gbà mí gbọ́, ó ṣètò àwárí ojútùú.
options.translation: He believed me and is preparing for a solution.

options.text: Ó ní ṣá o ṣeé rò, ṣùgbọ́n ó ti fẹ̀rọ̀ sí àwọn àgbàlagbà.
options.translation: He had doubts, but he consulted the elders.

options.text: Ọba fẹ mọ bí a ṣe le ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn Orisha láti gbà wa.
options.translation: The king wants to know how the Orisha can help us.

01.life_spirit_hint: Delivering the message was only the first step. Now, the real journey begins.

02.speaker: Ọbàtálá
02.text: Ó dara. Ṣùgbọ́n à ń ní iṣoro. Àwọn agbára òkùnkùn ń dá wa dúró.
02.translation: That is good. But we face a great problem. A dark force is blocking us.
02.scene_description: A sudden gust of wind shakes the trees, as if nature itself is warning of a growing threat.

options.text: Ta ni o ń dá yín dúró?
Ṣé a le gba agbara wọn kúrò?

02.life_spirit_hint: Not all battles are fought with weapons. Some require wisdom.

03.speaker: Ọbàtálá
03.text: Ìlú yìí yára bọ̀ sí ayé. Ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀nà wà, bí o bá ń ṣòro ọ̀rọ̀ pẹ̀lú Ògún.
03.translation: Your kingdom moves toward destruction. But there is a way—speak with Ògún.
03.scene_description: Ọbàtálá points toward a distant mountain where the god of war and iron, Ògún, resides.

options.text: Mo máa lọ sí Ògún kíákíá!
options.translation: I will go to Ògún immediately!

options.text: Kí ló yẹ kí n ṣe láti mura?
options.translation: What should I do to prepare?

03.life_spirit_hint: Strength and wisdom must go hand in hand.

04.speaker: Ọbàtálá
04.text: Ẹ̀mí kan ṣoṣo ló mọ bí a ṣe le wó ogún tí wọ́n fi di wa padà. O gbọdọ wá Ògún, Olùdá Irin.
04.translation: Only one spirit knows how to break the chains that bind us. You must seek Ògún, the Creator of Iron.
04.scene_description: A flash of lightning illuminates the sky as Ọbàtálá’s eyes glow with divine energy.

options.text: Mo ti ṣetan! Mo máa lọ bá Ògún!
options.translation: I am ready! I will find Ògún!

options.text: Ṣé Ògún yóò fẹ́ ran wa l’ọ́wọ́?
options.translation: Will Ògún be willing to help us?

04.life_spirit_hint: The path ahead is uncertain, but every journey starts with a step.
